item.title: Nigeria’s Nile Entertainment, U.K.’s Action Xtreme Ink First-Look Deal to Co-Produce and Distribute Slate of Action Films and Series in Africa (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Nile Entertainment, the Nigerian distribution company launched last year by veteran film executive Moses Babatope, has signed a first-look deal with Action Xtreme, the genre label of the U.K.’s Sovere
